Until last week I had the problem that everytime I logged in my volume was set to 100%. Even after disabling the Ubuntu jingle (played at -0dB! before) I sometimes moved the mouse too close to an audio file :O
Btw, I solved the audio volume at 100% issue by putting a script to /etc/X11/Xsession.d/ that sets audio volume to 12%.
The script sets audio volume to 12%, yes.
12% is fine for nearly anything, so you can imagine how much my neighbours hated me after I upgraded to 11.10 â€¦
